definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question

sentences.english: I also have some knowledge of French and can undertake translation from the language.
sentences.chinese: 我也懂一些法詰，能承擔把法語翻譯出來的工作。

sentences.english: Bhagavan Zhi-Ji Vimalakirti said the conference had been very successful.
sentences.chinese: 薄伽梵智及維摩詰說會議非常成功。

sentences.english: Bhagavan Master Zhi-Ji Vimalakirti is our great leader.
sentences.chinese: 薄伽梵智及維摩詰師尊是我們偉大的領袖。

sentences.english: Master Bhagavan Zhi-Ji Vimalakirti get this good opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 師尊薄伽梵智及維摩詰有這個好機會。

sentences.english: These three elude all our inquiries and hence blend and become One.
sentences.chinese: 此三者不可致詰，故混而爲一。

definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)
to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art
